name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior HubSpot Engineer with over 10 years of experience in creating and optimizing APIs, workflows, and CRM solutions on the HubSpot platform. Proficient in integrating various tools and enhancing system capabilities using **Zapier**, **Workato**, and **REST** APIs. Solid understanding of data management with **SQL** and proficient in frontend technologies such as **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, ensuring seamless user experiences. Experienced in designing scalable backend systems and automation tools, utilizing modern frameworks and cloud infrastructures. Successfully delivered innovative projects for prominent companies, demonstrating a unique blend of technical expertise and industry insight.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **API** and **CRM** capabilities within HubSpot to enhance automation workflows and improve user experience.
Engineered backend services in **Python** using **FastAPI** to streamline document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Developed event-driven solutions with **Celery** and **Redis** to manage asynchronous processing for financial transaction requests, improving processing speed by **40%**.
Created custom integrations with **QuickBooks** to facilitate seamless data transfer and reduce manual input errors by **30%**.
Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** and utilized **Terraform** for infrastructure management, ensuring compliance with industry regulations.
Implemented **REST**ful APIs to enhance interoperability between HubSpot and third-party applications, improving system efficiency.
Designed and maintained responsive web pages using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript** that resulted in a **25%** increase in customer engagement.
Led security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure, scalable authentication systems.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, ensuring compliance and overseeing release strategies using tools like **Zapier** and **Workato**.

Leveraged **API** integrations to connect **HubSpot** with external systems, enhancing CRM workflows and improving automation efficiency.
Designed and implemented custom **workflows** in **HubSpot** to optimize lead management processes, resulting in a **25%** increase in conversion rates.
Utilized **JavaScript** and **HTML** for front-end customizations, improving user interface experiences across the **HubSpot** platform.
Automated data flows between **QuickBooks** and **HubSpot** using **Zapier** and **Workato**, reducing manual entry errors by **40%**.
Performed in-depth **SQL** queries for data analysis and reporting, enabling data-driven decision making for various marketing campaigns.
Created and maintained comprehensive documentation for **HubSpot API** integrations and workflows, ensuring clarity and knowledge sharing among team members.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align technology strategies with business objectives, enhancing system integrations and implementation efficiency.

Utilized **HubSpot** to develop and enhance CRM workflows, maximizing client engagement and internal processes efficiently.
Designed and implemented **REST APIs** to integrate third-party tools like **Zapier** and **Workato** for seamless data exchange and workflow automation, resulting in a **30% increase** in operational efficiency.
Ensured high-quality integrations with **QuickBooks** and other financial tools by developing robust SQL queries for data management and reporting, achieving a **25% reduction** in data discrepancies.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate front-end applications developed using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, enhancing user experience and system performance.
Contributed to the team’s productivity by initiating regular API documentation and adhering to **HubSpot** best practices, leading to a **15% decrease** in onboarding time for new features.
Implemented systematic testing and maintenance processes for workflows, ensuring compliance with internal policies and improving reliability.
Developed tailored client solutions by analyzing user requirements and customizing **HubL** templates to optimize their marketing strategies.

skills:
**Programming Languages**
	Python (3.8+), SQL, JavaScript, Bash, HTML, CSS

  **Backend Frameworks**
	FastAPI, Flask, Django, Celery

  **Frontend Frameworks**
	JavaScript, HubL

  **API Technologies**
	REST, REST/gRPC APIs

  **Serverless and Cloud Functions**
	AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure, Docker, Kubernetes

  **Databases**
	PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis

  **DevOps**
	GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, CI/CD, PyTest, Git

  **Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure, Docker, Kubernetes

  **Other**
	AI/ML Tools: Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Airflow, MLflow, Microservices, Kafka, CRM, HubSpot, QuickBooks, Zapier, Workato, workflow
